name: Nicotek
tag_list: electronic-cigarettes, electric-cigarettes, vapor-kits, smokeless-cigarettes, e-cig, ecig, e-cigarette
overview:
Nicotek, LLC is one of the fastest growing Electronic cigarette companies in the US.

Nicotek has over 3 years of retail experience with electronic cigarettes and knows just about everything there is to know about what works and what doesn’t work in the retail environment. Currently, Nicotek sells the brand Metro in over 6,000 retail stores nationwide and will have over 10,000 by the end of 2011. Metro Electronic cigarettes are quickly becoming the preferred brand by major retailers and the internet following is growing rapidly.

Nicotek also boasts outstanding and innovative packaging and merchandising options for their products.

Nicotek lives by their motto, “Electronic Cigarettes Done RightÂ®”
